addHandler(Object, Object, String, int) - Method in interface org.jgrapes.core.Manager
Adds a method of the component managed by this manager as a handler for a specific event and channel.
addHandler(Object, Object, String) - Method in interface org.jgrapes.core.Manager
A shortcut for invoking Manager.addHandler(Object, Object, String, int) with priority 0.
